subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira leads the A.L. in runs batted in, total bases and extra base hits and is second in home runs, but is likely to finish behind Joe Mauer in the M.V.P. race.
snippet: Mark Teixeira leads the A.L. in runs batted in, total bases and extra base hits and is second in home runs, but is likely to finish behind Joe Mauer in the M.V.P. race.
